title: More Cars Logo
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want the More Cars logo to be shown on every page\
And it should always link back to the start page\
So whenever I feel lost I can quickly return to a known state
description:
* the More Cars logo is prominently shown in the header section
* the logo is not included as graphics file, but created via a regular font
* the logo always links back to the start page
